messages.message: If you try to pan left/right in a document, you cannot do this when clicking over a table. This took me a while to figure out because the document I am using has an entire page of bank transactions which is picked up as a table. I expected this pan ability to work, or at least if it doesn't to highlight the table I'm selecting so its clear why I can't pan
I'm unsure of if this is a bug or an expected outcome - happy to make a ticket if required!
hmm this is expected behavior, but i agree that itâ€™s confusing if the table takes up basically the entire page :thinking_face:
